parameters: You reckon we'll run into much resistance?
What, you chickening out? It's too late to back down
qsprite 0 play phone lock pause wait
\n<Tseng>Give me a status update. Have you found any others?
\n<\N[1]>Yeah, two men, just ran up ahead. It looks like
they're heading for the reactor. I'm on their tail
I figured as much. Listen, I need you to follow
them and try to get some info.
\nThe most important thing is their plans, but
anything is good. Who they work for, what they
want... just find out anything you can.
\nWhen you have something, let me know
\nActually, leave your PHS on so I can still hear.
I want to be able to relay everything to Veld ASAP.
\n<\N[1]>You've got Veld involved? I thought our responses were
supposed to be less intense now.
\n\N[1], this is a potential terrorist threat.
Whether it's Wutai or not, we need the highest
\n<Tseng>And if they really are hitting the reactor...
\nGood. Find and interrogate as many of them as
possible, but make sure you don't get surrounded.
\nThat's what I like to hear. I'll work on getting
you some backup in the meantime.
Yeah, pretty sure. I'll keep going all the way to
the mako reactor. Your job is-

Hey, the hell are you acting all rattled for!?
I'm sorry, it's just... I don't want to question
command, but is one man really enough here?
Were you asleep during the briefing? Main squad'll
be practically around the corner by now.
I don't think Shears is just sending us in as
